mapper.select: SELECT count(T2.GNO) FROM MEMBERS T1, GMEMBERS T2, GGROUP T3 WHERE #{mno}=T1.MNO AND T1.MNO=T2.MNO AND T2.GNO= T3.GNO
SELECT T3.GNO gno,T3.GNAME gname, T3.GINTRO gintro, T3.GEND_DATE gend_date FROM MEMBERS T1, GMEMBERS T2, GGROUP T3 WHERE T1.MNO = #{mno} AND T1.MNO = T2.MNO AND T2.GNO = #{gno} AND T2.GNO = T3.GNO

SELECT T3.GNAME gname, T3.GINTRO gintro, T3.GEND_DATE gend_date, T2.GNO gno, T2.MANAGER_STATUS manager_status, T2.COLOR color FROM MEMBERS T1, GMEMBERS T2, GGROUP T3 ` WHERE #{mno}=T1.MNO AND T2.MNO=T1.MNO AND T2.GNO=T3.GNO

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, T3.GNAME gname, T3.GINTRO gintro, T3.GEND_DATE gend_date, T2.GNO gno, T2.MANAGER_STATUS manager_status, T2.COLOR color FROM MEMBERS T1, GMEMBERS T2, GGROUP T3 WHERE #{mno}=T1.MNO AND T2.MNO=T1.MNO AND T2.GNO=T3.GNO ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startIndex} AND #{startIndex}+5 ORDER BY RNUM ASC
SELECT T1.bmno, T1.bno, T1.bname, T1.lcode FROM iboard T1, members T2 WHERE T2.mno = #{mno} AND T1.lcode = T2.lcode ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM

SELECT ROWNUM rnum, startday, endday, cschedule, color FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT T2.STARTDAY startday,T2.ENDDAY endday, T2.CSCHEDULE cschedule, T1.COLOR color FROM GMEMBERS T1, GSCHEDULE T2 WHERE T1.MNO=#{mno} AND T1.GNO=T2.GNO) ORDER BY startday ASC) WHERE ROWNUM ^= #{dataSize}+1

SELECT * FROM (SELECT T1.startday startday, T1.endday endday, T1.cschedule cschedule, T2.color color FROM GSCHEDULE T1, GMEMBERS T2, GGROUP T3 WHERE T1.GNO=#{gno} AND T1.GNO = T2.GNO AND T2.GNO = T3.GNO AND T2.MNO = #{mno}) ORDER BY startday ASC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT T1.startday startday, T1.endday endday, T1.cschedule cschedule, T2.color color FROM GSCHEDULE T1, GMEMBERS T2, GGROUP T3 WHERE T2.MNO = #{mno} AND T2.GNO = T3.GNO AND T3.GNO = T1.GNO) ORDER BY startday ASC
